word: The disciples had searched one another\92s faces closely as they asked, \93Lord, is it I?\94 Until now Judas had sat silent, as if unconcerned. Now his silence drew all eyes to him. To escape the scrutiny of the disciples, he nerved himself to ask, as they had done, \93Master, is it I?\94 Jesus solemnly replied, \93Thou hast said.\94. . .
